hero.title: YOUR PET IS ONE OF A KIND. SO SHOULD THEIR TAG. THEIR ENTIRE LIFE, ONE QR SCAN AWAY.
hero.subtitle: A smart tag that saves everything you need to take better care of your pet . Contact information, medical history, routines, expenses, and more... all in one place.
hero.paragraph: Imagine a world where you never have to worry about updating your dog‚Äôs tag. With our app and smart collar, all your best friend's information is just a scan away.
card.qr.desc: The best tags on the market
card.love.desc: your pets as much as you

whyChap.title: Why CHAP?
whyChap.subTitle: Simple, fast, and hassle-free.
whyChap.smalText: everything your pet needs, all in one place
whyChap.featureOne: Update your information and your pet‚Äôs as many times as you need.
whyChap.featureTwo: Receive an email with the dog's approximate location on a map when someone scans the tag if they get lost.
whyChap.featureTree: Track expenses and manage your pet's finances.
whyChap.featureFour: Keep medical history, vet visits, and vaccinations in one place.
whyChap.featureFive: Easily upload files, lab results, and reports.
whyChap.featureSix: Log daily meals, mood, behavior, and health.
whyChap.featureSeven: Activate the travel mode with instructions for personalized care.
whyChap.featureEigth: Generate a missing pet poster in seconds ‚Äî ready to print or share on social media!.

ChapStats.boxOnePar: One scan, One chance to go back home
ChapStats.boxTwoTitle: 45% of pet owners forget their pet‚Äôs medical history.
ChapStats.boxThreePar: CHAP keeps your wallet in check.

2019.title: It all started with Roxy.
2019.desc: We made a decision that changed our lives: we became pet parents. We adopted Roxy, and with her came long walks, adventures, questions‚Ä¶ and expenses.

2022.title: A new city, a new number, another tag.
2022.desc: Over the years came moves, job changes, fresh starts‚Ä¶ and with every change, a new ID tag for Roxy. That‚Äôs when CHAP was born.

2024.title: Built by pet parents, for pet parents.
2024.desc: We wanted something that truly worked ‚Äî no more new tags, no more forgotten medical histories, everything in one place.

2025.title: CHAP is a reality.
2025.desc: Today, CHAP is in the hands of those who need it most: people who love their pets and want to care for them better. One tag. Their whole story. Always with you.

scrollVideo.scroll.text1: Your pet is unique. So is their tag. üêæ‚ú®
scrollVideo.scroll.text2:
The world may be huge, but with just one scan,
you‚Äôll always know where they are.
scrollVideo.scroll.text3: All their care, adventures, and history at the palm of your hand.

extraFeatures.title: Extra features
extraFeatures.description: Unlock these features the moment you buy your tag!

mainCard.title: Create your first pet!
mainCard.description: From here, you'll be able to care for and get to know your furry companions better.

step1.title: Welcome,
step1.description:
Are you ready to care for and track your pet?
Create their profile, design their tag, purchase it, and enjoy all the features.

step2.title: Add the information!
step2.subtitle: The more information you provide, the better. This will help us complete your profile faster.
step2.helpText: Click to show or hide this information on the tag. Don‚Äôt worry if you don‚Äôt set it up now ‚Äî you can change it anytime:

form.vet: Trusted vet (in case you can't be reached)

step3.title: Create your tag
step3.description:
You can design it now or later, but you‚Äôll need it to add more details.
Go ahead and pick your favorite shape and color!

step4.title: You're just one step away!
step4.description:
One click, buy your tag and unlock all the features it has to offer.
If you want to keep exploring or create more profiles and tags, save this one in your cart.

medicalHistoryForm.title: Create medical history
medicalHistoryForm.description: Add your pet‚Äôs general medical information
medicalHistoryForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Does your pet have any current illnesses or conditions, or is it completely healthy?
medicalHistoryForm.currentTreatmentPlaceholder: Is your pet currently undergoing any medical treatment?
medicalHistoryForm.allergiesPlaceholder: Is your pet allergic to any medications, foods, or specific substances?
medicalHistoryForm.currentMedicationsPlaceholder: List any medications your pet takes regularly, including dosage and frequency if known.
medicalHistoryForm.surgeryHistoryPlaceholder: Include the type of surgery, approximate date, and any relevant notes.
medicalHistoryForm.vaccinationStatusPlaceholder: Is your pet up to date with its vaccines?
medicalHistoryForm.bloodTypePlaceholder: If known, include it here. This is helpful in case of emergencies.
medicalHistoryForm.dietPlaceholder: Does your pet have a special diet? Include brand, portion sizes, etc.
medicalHistoryForm.behaviorPlaceholder: How does your pet behave around people, other animals, or in different situations? Mention fears, aggression, anxiety, if any.

create_vaccine.title: Create vaccines
create_vaccine.description: 80% of pet owners don‚Äôt remember the vaccination details accurately. Come on, it‚Äôs just 4 fields ‚Äî easier than picking up poop. You‚Äôve got this!

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: This website, accessible from www.chapstore.es, is operated by Angelo Maiele, a sole proprietor (freelancer) legally registered in Spain. By accessing or using this website and/or its products and services, you agree to be legally bound by these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy.
terms.section1Text: CHAP is an ID tag with a QR code that links to an online profile containing essential information about your pet. Users can create profiles, update medical history, track expenses, and manage daily logs through our web platform.
terms.section2Text: Once your order is placed on www.chapstore.es, you‚Äôll receive a confirmation email. Orders are processed within 1‚Äì2 business days and shipped via Correos.

section2Details.usa: Delivery to USA and EU: 5‚Äì10 business days (may vary)
section2Details.shipping: Shipping fees are calculated at checkout.

terms.section3Text: For orders within Spain: All prices include VAT. For orders to the United States: VAT is not applied.
terms.section4Text: Payments are securely processed through Stripe. We accept major credit/debit cards.
terms.section5Text: You may cancel your order before it has been shipped. Once shipped, returns are accepted only in cases of defective or incorrect items. To request a cancellation or return, reply to your order confirmation email.
terms.section6Text: The QR tag should be securely attached to your pet‚Äôs collar. It‚Äôs the user‚Äôs responsibility to keep profile data up to date. CHAP is not liable for lost pets due to outdated or incomplete information.
terms.section7Text: All materials on www.chapstore.es ‚Äî including branding, text, and design ‚Äî are the intellectual property of CHAP and may not be copied or redistributed.
terms.section8Text: CHAP is a support tool, not a replacement for microchips, legal ID requirements, or veterinary advice. We are not liable for loss, injury, or other consequences related to incorrect use of the service.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: CHAP is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and store your information when you use our website and services.

section1List.personal: Personal info: name, email, shipping address, payment details
section1List.pet: Pet info: name, breed, medical data, photos, notes
section1List.usage: Platform usage data (analytics, browser info, etc.)

section2List.personalize: To personalize features and suggestions based on your pet
section2List.news: To send product updates, tips, or important account information (you can unsubscribe at any time)

privacy.section3Text: All data is securely stored. Payment data is processed by Stripe and is never stored on our servers. You can modify or delete your data anytime from your dashboard or by contacting us.
privacy.section4Text: Your data is only shared with essential partners (e.g., Stripe for payments, Correos for shipping). We do not sell your data.
privacy.section5Text: We use cookies to improve user experience and gather anonymous analytics. You can disable cookies in your browser at any time.
privacy.section6Text: In accordance with the GDPR and applicable international data laws, you have the right to access, modify, or delete your data at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.section7Text: For any privacy questions or requests:

expenses.title: TRACK YOUR FINANCES
expenses.lockedFeature: Get your tag and unlock this and many more features.

travelMode.title: Going on a trip?
travelMode.description: Add all the important information here for the person who will be taking care of your pet while you're away.
travelMode.subtitle: Your pet says they might forgive you‚Ä¶ but only if you leave clear instructions and don‚Äôt forget their favorite treat (yes, chicken included).

vetVisitForm.title: Create veterinary visits
vetVisitForm.description: Every visit matters. Keep your pet‚Äôs medical history up to date. If you switch vets, you‚Äôll have everything ready to show them.
vetVisitForm.note: Don‚Äôt feel like writing it all down? No worries! You can also upload the vet‚Äôs report directly.

form.clinicAddressPlaceholder: Where was the visit? (Clinic name or address)
form.treatmentPlaceholder: What treatment or medications were given?
form.documentsPlaceholder: Upload the vet report or any related files

tracker_page.food_line1: {{name}} needs between {{minCalories}} and {{maxCalories}} kcal/day, depending on the activity levels.
tracker_page.food_line2: That equals to approx. {{minGrams}}g ‚Äì {{maxGrams}}g of standard food ({{kcalPerGram}} kcal/g).
tracker_page.no_weight: Add the weight in the medical history to get useful information for your pet.
tracker_page.water_line: {{name}} should drink approximately {{mlPerDay}} ml of water a day.

tag_description.text: With this tag, you can add general medical information, record vaccinations and veterinary visits, obtain the location when scanning the tag (you will receive a message with its location), generate lost pet flyers in PDF, create alerts, perform daily check-ups to detect infections, illnesses, or track training, receive useful tips, and keep track of your pet-related expenses.
